IActorServicePartitionClient IActorServicePartitionClient Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

Defines the interface for the client that communicate with an actor within a service partition.

Edit

In this Article
